comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0

Combination of attribute "disabled" + some background color in Windows XP
makes HTML radio buttons unvisible

http://demovik.testk.fr-wd.com/Firefox4-Attribute_disabled+Background_Color+Windows_XP/index.html

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open URL http://demovik.testk.fr-wd.com/Firefox4-Attribute_disabled+Background_Color+Windows_XP/index.html in Firefox4 under Windows XP
Actual Results:  
Low visibility of disabled HTML inputs

Expected Results:  
To show disabled radio buttons like in Windows 7/Vista

The same problem appears in Google Chrome
